metadata.title: CVE-2021-45450 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In Mbed TLS before 2.28.0 and 3.x before 3.1.0, psa_cipher_generate_iv andpsa_cipher_encrypt allow policy bypass or oracle-based decryption when theoutput buffer is at memory locations accessible to an untrustedapplication.

criterions.comment: mbedtls package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
